channel.title: How do I change the Name on my bank
channel.description:
When I open my bank it says: The Bank of BLAHBLAH.
And I Want it to say: The Bank of MYSERVER
Where is this located? source or client folder?
and where at in that folder?
Ive searched it in both cant find it...

item.title: How do I change the Name on my bank
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“TimmahPwnz, post:5, topic:304955”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=401219.msg2973743#msg2973743 date=1254100690]

Source, texthandler.java

Everything To Do IN GAME, Is Source

Everything To Do With The Client ( Like Adding Models, And Changing Looks Of Client ) Are In Your Client Folder

if you already see the answer why post?

[/quote]

Sorry[/quote]

np.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the Name on my bank
